Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I run Android applications on my PC with the Android emulator?  Not sure if I am searching with right terms but I could not figure out if it is possible to install Google Play to further install apps from Play appstore on an Android Virtual Device (running on emulator). I am using the AVD on API 10, i.e. Android 2.3.3 and so far, I found no way to install application via app-stores.
Title: Can Google Play be installed on Andoid Virtual Device, running API 10 (Android 2.3.3)?

history.Text: Not sure if I am searching with right terms but I could not figure out if it is possible to install Google Play to further install apps from Play appstore on an Android Virtual Device (running on emulator). I am using the AVD on API 10, i.e. Android 2.3.3 and so far, I found no way to install application via app-stores.
Can Google Play be installed on Andoid Virtual Device, running API 10 (Android 2.3.3)?

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [How can I run Android applications on my PC with the Android emulator?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/3930/how-can-i-run-android-applications-on-my-pc-with-the-android-emulator)  Not sure if I am searching with right terms but I could not figure out if it is possible to install Google Play to further install apps from Play appstore on an Android Virtual Device (running on emulator). I am using the AVD on API 10, i.e. Android 2.3.3 and so far, I found no way to install application via app-stores.
